3: Right, Commandant—I've noticed as well. These guards seem to be pushing us further inside intentionally.
Still, we can't do anything even though we have figured that out. Commandant, I hate being played.

2: We have to be even calmer in this situation.
4: We're slowly entering the enemy's trap.

3: I'll come up with an emergency plan immediately. We have to be prepared for the worst-case scenario...
To wear the Queen's shackles is an honor bestowed to you and that lowly creature by your side...
...How did she appear so close to us?!
As the royal guard of Her Majesty, I command you, Construct... Arrest the human by your side, and hand me the human!
Watch your feet, Commandant! The guards are crawling out from the trapdoors below us!
Defy Her Majesty's will, and you too will be shackled, regardless if you are a fierce Construct warrior or not!
A holographic projection of Liv appears on your comms...
My servants! Take down the Construct and human before me!
